attributes.action: More people to be trained to be a health workers in LEDC's
attributes.additional_details:
There are millions of people that die every year of preventable diseases and illnesses in LEDC's (Low Economically Developed Country) such as countries in Africa and Afghanistan. Health workers can prescribe life saving vaccinations and drugs to help save lives.
THERE ARE NOT ENOUGH HEALTH WORKERS!
we need the government to fund for people to become life saving health workers.
